scripts.preinstall: cd ../javascript-utils/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "typeScript,node frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "typeScript,node frontend" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
